HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!
One Soda Per Day Raises Diabetes Risk, Study Suggests

Message.Msg: They could make Coke much healthier just by using cane sugar instead of using a toxic sweetener like HFCS that is cheaper and sweeter. At Coca-Cola its profits first then your health.
